name: assisted
description: Assisted equipment is designed to provide support and help users perform exercises with reduced body weight, often used for rehabilitation and training with less stress on joints.

name: band
description: Resistance bands are elastic bands used to add resistance to exercises, helping to build strength and improve flexibility.

name: barbell
description: A barbell is a long metal bar with weights attached to both ends, commonly used for weightlifting and strength training exercises.

name: body weight
description: Bodyweight exercises involve using your own body weight as resistance, such as push-ups, squats, and lunges.

name: bosu ball
description: A Bosu ball is a half-circle stability ball placed on a rigid platform, used to improve balance, stability, and core strength.

name: cable
description: Cable machines use adjustable pulleys and cables to provide resistance for various exercises, offering versatility and targeting different muscle groups.

name: dumbbell
description: A dumbbell is a small handheld weight used for resistance training, offering a wide range of exercises to target specific muscles.

name: elliptical machine
description: An elliptical machine is a low-impact cardio machine that simulates stair climbing, walking, and running, providing a full-body workout.

name: ez barbell
description: An EZ barbell is a specialized barbell with a zigzag or W-shaped design, mainly used for bicep curls and tricep exercises.

name: hammer
description: A hammer is a weighted exercise tool with a handle, used for swinging and rotation exercises to build strength and power.

name: kettlebell
description: A kettlebell is a cast-iron ball with a handle, used for dynamic exercises that combine strength, cardio, and flexibility training.

name: leverage machine
description: Leverage machines use barbells and weight plates to provide resistance, often providing a more stable and controlled workout environment.

name: medicine ball
description: A medicine ball is a weighted ball used for dynamic exercises, adding resistance and challenge to various movements.

name: olympic barbell
description: An Olympic barbell is a heavy-duty barbell used in Olympic weightlifting, powerlifting, and strength training exercises.

name: resistance band
description: Resistance bands are elastic bands used to add resistance to exercises, helping to build strength and improve flexibility.

name: roller
description: A roller is a foam or grid-textured cylinder used for self-massage and myofascial release, helping to improve flexibility and reduce muscle soreness.

name: rope
description: Ropes, such as battle ropes, are heavy and thick ropes used for full-body workouts that engage the core and upper body muscles.
